doc.field: MONY REAL ESTATE INVESTORS [MYM] 3RD QTR FEB 28

- Oper shr nine cts vs 128 cts Qtly div 18 cts vs 22 cts prior Oper net 951,000 vs 1,817,000 Total income 5,010,000 vs 5,575,000 Nine mths Oper shr 39 cts vs 59 cts Oper net 4,014,000 vs 5,936,000 Total income 15.2 mln vs 16.7 mln NOTE: Current year net both periods includes 750,000 dslr provision for possible losses. Net excludes gains from sale of investment of 1,461,000 dlrs vs 346,000 dlrs in quarter and in nine mths. Dividend pay April 15, record March 31.
